ygData.subject: Re: LOOK AT THIS VERY IMPORTANT SERIOUS
ygData.msgSnippet: The Enchanter pet will attack only when the Enchanter is hit, defending her. It accepts no commands.  Our pet is apparently limited by what it can hit by the
ygData.messageBody:
The Enchanter pet will attack only when the Enchanter is hit, defending her.
It accepts no commands. Our pet is apparently limited by what it can hit
by the "within 5 levels" PvP rule. Unfortunately, I cannot hit anyone
within the pets' range as my pet is 8th and I am 21st. Not that I would
want to attack someone that small, I just want it to attack whoever I can.
That is the problem.

Odd right?

~Xillith


>From: "David" <milamber@...>
>Reply-To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
>To: <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] LOOK AT THIS VERY IMPORTANT SERIOUS
>Date: Tue, 29 Jun 1999 14:35:13 -0500
>
>From: "David" <milamber@...>
>
>Question, Pet will not attack in PvP? How did the enchanter pet attack us?
>or their pet has different rules? or am I confused again?
>
>Also I have had a pet named "Loser" before :) and current nick name for my
>pet(s) "Milk Bone" :)
>
>David
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Xillith ofNeriak <xillith@...>
>To: <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
>Sent: Tuesday, June 29, 1999 11:01 AM
>Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] LOOK AT THIS VERY IMPORTANT SERIOUS
>
>
>From: Xillith ofNeriak <xillith@...>
>
>GUYS!!!
>
>OUR PET WILL NOT DEFEND YOU IN PVP!!! Do not even consider it a factor!
>Gebeker will stand there and let you get pounded, period.
>
><Snip>
>
>Enchanters? FORGET IT, DO NOT FIGHT
>THEM. Teshan (lvl 1) will eliminate your higher level advantage and you
>will find yourself charmed over and over attacking critters while the
>caster
>meditates and lays DoT on you. Lucky for us, we have more Hp than the
>Enchanter can take away without having us tank other monsters. Unlucky for
>us, the last thing a good enchanter does is summon her OWN pet and giggle
>as
>we consider attacking her while we sport 40% life and face her same level
>animation, allowing her to meditate and finish us off if we choose to hang
>around. Wizards? Nuff said. Clerics? LOL!! Good luck! The Druid is RAW
>POWER. The Monk will Kung Foo our goofy ass back to respawn. The
>Shaman....I've spanked a bunch of Shaman Highlanders, I would give us a
>60/40 advantage.
>
><more snip>
>
